The film follows the struggles of Queen Elizabeth II after the death of Princess Diana, and features an impressive cast including Helen Mirren, James Cromwell, and Michael Sheen. Another great option is "Armageddon," which stars Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, and Liv Tyler in a thrilling story about a group of astronauts who must save the world from a massive asteroid. Both of these movies offer exciting plot twists and talented actors, so I hope you enjoy them!
